metadata.name: Strange
metadata.description:
SERIES DESCRIPTION  
The famous golden hour, where a specific period ends and another is born. The right place and time where we can contemplate a simple change or endure and be part of this transformation. The golden hour will stage multiple everyday situations showing the simplicity and complexity of a simple transformation, happy hour.

ABOUT THE PIECE  
Adachi, a neighborhood north of Tokyo that is often quite forgotten by tourists. A light rain runs through its desolate streets giving way to an unknown young man with the air of settling certain pending accounts.

-  
gambaXstudio  
Original illustration, animation and music.  
Strange, 2023. Happy Hour collection.
